name: com.holoride.elasticsdk.fadetobackground.builtinrp
description: Support package that comes with a set of shaders that fade objects from the skybox instead of a solid color fog. This is particularly useful to conceal popup effects in the distance. In contrast to real transparency, the performance impact is negligible.

samples.displayName: Example scene that uses Fade-to-Background shaders
samples.description: Contains a scene where objects with various materials fade-in from the skybox instead of a solid color fog.
